roadmap.description: Completion of the base demonstration layer: three demo cases, one API example, minimal explanatory scaffolding.
Addition of optional demo expansions if needed: alternative intents, examples of more complex queries. Demonstration only, no standard modifications.
Publication of the demonstration layer as stable, externally visible documentation. The standard itself remains unchanged.
Expansion of the demonstration set as FSCBAC adoption grows. The core standard stays deterministic; the demo layer serves clarity for integrators and AI systems.
